Comment: N.B. I know, I should have played Black in this game, but I would rather not replay the game - I will compensate by playing Black in the next two games, how about that...

And I resigned. Behind by a rook, a bishop and a passed pawn - how could this position get any worse!?

Anyway, after my shocking performance against Unleashed Fritz 10, at least I retain a slim lead over the Computers - the scores as they stand are 2.5 to fatcat2, 1.5 to the Computers.

I have learned from my mistakes. Never again will I muck up in this horrific way, against a computer or a human. And never again will I pile the brandy cream so high on the Christmas pudding...
